creator: Quark Brain Lab
descriptionHtml:
CHALLENGE YOUR ABILITY OF MENTAL MATH AND IMPROVE BRAIN HEALTH.

Mathematiqa is collection of math games, puzzle and riddle. According to a new brain study mental math, puzzles and riddles are connected with better emotional health and help to stave off anxiety and depression. People who solve puzzles, riddles and play brain game have some advantages over who do not. Solving puzzles and riddles improves concentration and train the brain to block any source of distraction. Mental puzzles help to reduce stress level by making the mind to focus on thinking the solution instead of the reason of anxiety. Math Puzzle, brain game and riddles promotes healthy mindset by stimulating the brain and blocking negative thoughts. Moreover, puzzles improves memory, logical thinking and problem solving skills.

Mental mathematics not only stimulates your mind but also helps you get a better number sense. This app is perfect for students and kids who are learning basics of arithmetic: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. And also suitable for adults to keep their mind and brain in good shape.

This unique brain game builds mental math skills quickly and increase capacity to hold multiple pieces of mathematical information in the head simultaneously.

Mental math and puzzle keeps our brain sharp and boosts learning capabilities. While mathematical skills are supposed to be a task of the left brain, mental math and puzzle stimulates the right brain which is responsible for imagination, visualization and creativity. Doing math mentally requires one to think of creative solutions and visualize numbers; which involves using the right brain. Mental math relies heavily on memory and helps to improve memory. A recent study suggests that mental math and puzzle stimulates a region of the brain called the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex, which has already been linked to depression and anxiety. It also suggests that the more active a person’s dorsolateral prefrontal cortex is, the more likely he or she is to adapt their thoughts about emotionally difficult situations.

GAMES AVAILABLE TO PLAY IN MATHEMATIQA:

1. Quick Math
2. Think Fast
3. Multiple Choice
4. True or False
5. Perplexed
6. Thought Engine

Boost up your IQ, logical thinking, and brain health with Mathematiqa. All the games are fun to play and enjoyable. Wish you a very pleasurable journey with Mathematiqa.
descriptionShort: Perfect GYM 🏋️ for your brain; Stimulate your brain with Math Game and Puzzle
title: Mathematica - Math Puzzle Brain Game

descriptionHtml:
CHALLENGE YOUR ABILITY OF MENTAL MATH AND IMPROVE BRAIN HEALTH.

Mathematica is a collection of math games, puzzles, and brain games. According to a new brain study mental math, puzzles and riddles are connected with better emotional health and help to stave off anxiety and depression. People who solve number puzzles have some advantages over those who do not. Solving puzzles improves concentration and train the brain to block any source of distraction. Math puzzles help to reduce stress levels by making the mind focus on thinking about the solution instead of the reason for anxiety. Solving math puzzles promotes a healthy mindset by stimulating the brain and blocking negative thoughts. Moreover, number puzzles improve memory, logical thinking, and problem-solving skills. Challenge your mind with this easy-to-play number puzzle from a top developer, and become a real puzzle master! Thousands of number games to explore.

Math puzzles are very helpful for the improvement of your brain, logical thinking, and memory. The puzzle game has well-balanced difficulty levels both for beginner and advanced players. It will enhance your IQ and make your brain sharp. People who like number puzzles will also enjoy this brain game. These number puzzles are great for whenever you need a break from your daily routine. Pick up your phone or tablet, solve some puzzles to relax and unwind! Solve number puzzles daily and unlock cool achievements.

Math Puzzles not only stimulate your mind but also helps you get a better number sense. This app is perfect for students and kids who are learning the basics of arithmetic: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. And also suitable for adults to keep their minds and brain in good shape.

This unique brain game builds mental math skills quickly and increases the capacity to hold multiple pieces of mathematical information in the head simultaneously.

Mental math and puzzle keeps our brain sharp and boosts learning capabilities. While mathematical skills are supposed to be a task of the left brain, mental math and puzzle stimulate the right brain which is responsible for imagination, visualization, and creativity. Doing math mentally requires one to think of creative solutions and visualize numbers; which involves using the right brain. Mental math relies heavily on memory and helps to improve memory. A recent study suggests that mental math and puzzle stimulates a region of the brain called the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex, which has already been linked to depression and anxiety. It also suggests that the more active a person’s dorsolateral prefrontal cortex is, the more likely he or she is to adapt their thoughts about emotionally difficult situations.

1. Quick Math

4. True or False
5. Perplexed
6. Thought Engine

Boost up your IQ, logical thinking, and brain health with brain games. All the games are fun to play and enjoy. Wish you a very pleasurable journey with Mathematica.
